name: Airship Engineer Goggles
description: These practical goggles are used by engineers and aeronauts from all over the Archipelago.

name: Alpine hat with long hair
description: A traditional hat, mostly seen on reenactment fairs. Very chic with long hair.

name: Alpine hat with short hair
description: A traditional hat, mostly seen on reenactment fairs. Very elegant with short hair.

name: Baldie Style
description: Sometimes less is more.

name: Bandana and Spray
description: Careful when you go through doorways...

name: Big Bandana
description: Keeps your hair out of your eyes during Temtem fights.

name: Big hair
description: Only slightly tied to keep it under control.

name: Camo long hair bandana
description: This handy bandana saves you a trip to the hair salon.

name: Camo short hair bandana
description: Even short hair can be a pain if it gets in your eyes...

name: CapTem
description: Like a Temcard for your hair, for those days you don't feel like washing it.

name: Cleo Bangs
description: For lovers of tidy hair and strictly straight angles.

name: Daisy Buns
description: A bold choice for tamer with luxuriant hair. Don't try to sleep on it!

name: Femme side part
description: Simple but cute and oh-so feminine, for tamers who want to look chic in the dojo and in the field.

name: Flat cap with long hair
description: The classic Arburian headwear for weekends in the city or pleasant hikes in the countryside. Keeps your hair nice and tidy.

name: Flat cap with short hair
description: The classic Arburian headwear for weekends in the city or pleasant hikes in the countryside. Keeps the rain off your head

name: Flat Top
description: A trendy haircut, as seen on TemTV.

name: Full Dreadlocks
description: A statement as much as a style, this look conveys freedom and independence.

name: Hattaco
description: Love tacos? Why not show it to the world? There's no fashion police in the Archipelago.

name: Headband
description: An easier way to keep your hair tidy in the classroom and in the field.

name: High Tie
description: This high style adds a few centimeters to your height - and millions to your coolness factor.

name: Hyperbangs
description: Cool and edgy, if you don't mind the restricted cone of vision.

name: Incognito Hood
description: This hood covers your feature - enough to let you slip around the Guards if they don't pay much attention...

name: Kisiwo
description: The natural big-hair look that has won over the boulevards of the Uhuru.

name: Long bob
description: A simple yet elegant long bob, easy to wear but with lots of volume.

name: Long parted haircut
description: Long, natural and easy for the understatedly elegant tamer.

name: Long wooly
description: As fuzzy and charming as the shorter wooly style, but with even more fuzzy goodness!

name: Loose ponytail
description: A classic style favored by tamers and martial artists alike, good for keeping hair out of your face while you do the fighting.

name: Mask and bobbed hair
description: The best solution for protection, anonymity, and mysterious allure... with a cute touch.

name: Mask and short hair
description: Practical and hygienic, this combo makes sure your view is clear and your airways are protected.

name: Mohawk
description: All the rage among alternative young (and young-at-heart) tamers.

name: Myrisles Chic
description: Hoop earrings, a simple ponytail and a hibiscus for the effortless Omninesian charmer.

name: Pansunglasses
description: Cut down the glare, amp the cool factor.

name: Pushed Up Shades
description: For when you wear them just for the feels.

name: Resistance cap
description: Keeps your hair tidy while you defeat General X.

name: Samurai bun
description: A modern revival of a traditional Cipanki hairstyle!

name: Shaved and dreadlocks
description: Eye-catching and unmistakeable, this Omninesian style is a must amongst cool kids.

name: Short wooly
description: Naturally fuzzy and uncomplicated for a casual and adorable look.

name: Side bangs
description: A relaxed, and informal haircut, popular among the sportier young tamers.

name: Spiky Hair
description: A young, unisex style for hip tamers and fashion-conscious rebels.

name: Swimmer Kit
description: Ready to explore any body of water... or just chill by the poolside.

name: Swimming Cap
description: Simple but very practical for tamers with longer hair.

name: Swimming Cap and Goggles
description: For serious swimmers of the Sillaro.

name: Tacohat
description: What's the right way to wear it? Up to you.

name: TemCap
description: Don't let all that Temtem taming go to your head...

name: The Aina
description: It's been at least twenty years since she last wore it like this, but she was quite the fashion icon back then.

name: Tucmani Hood
description: A very convenient hood to conceal one's identity, ideal for renegades, fugitives and tamer's of mystery...

name: Widow's Peak
description: The haircut of last generation's cinema idols! It does get any more vintage than this...

name: Uhuru cut
description: A cutting-edge style popular amongst the cool kids of the cosmopolitan Uhuru.

name: Anonymous Cloak
description: A cloak that should make you fairly inconspicuous in the streets of Quetzal...

name: Breezy shirt
description: A flashy open shirt over a plain color t-shirt, for that summer look.

name: Button down formal shirt
description: Cut by the legendary shirtmakers of Properton, this is the gold standard for formal attire - minus the tie, for extra youth points.

name: Cold shoulder shirt
description: Long sleeve or short sleeve? Have the best of both with this innovative, trend-setting design.

name: CoolTam leather jacket
description: The definitive urban vibes jacket, for the tamer who sets the trends, rather than follow them.

name: Cropped Tube Top
description: For daring tamers who don't do tanning lines.

name: Demimono
description: Half Miyako-traditional, half Neoedo-modern, this original jacket is 100% contemporary Cipanku.

name: Faded T-shirt
description: Create your own cool colour transitions!

name: Fieldwork Vest
description: Protective as well as practical, this multi-pocket vest is ideal for long days of Temtem catching in the wild.

name: Green Dot T-shirt
description: Large, round dots provide a striking visual contrast to your favourite dye.

name: Hoodie
description: Comfortable and convenient, for those days you gotta go to the Temporium and don't wanna dress up.

name: Kisiwan Resistance top
description: Protects your torso from the Kisiwan Pansun... and your fists, in case you come to blows with the Belsoto.

name: Layered t-shirts
description: A short-sleeve t-shirt over a long-sleeve one, to mix and match colors however you like.

name: Lochburgian knitted jumper
description: Spotting elaborate cable and honeycomb knitting patterns, this jumper has kept Lochburgian sailors dry and warm for generations.

name: Open Shirt
description: An informal style that screams "too cool for school". Or even the Accademia!

name: Pewki Sweater
description: Everyone's favourite Water Temtem and its unmistakable toothy smile.

name: Plain T-shirt
description: Show your true colours with this uncomplicated short sleeved t-shirt.

name: Protective Chestplate
description: An innovative piece of armor that protects the chest from blows while allowing excellent freedom of movement.

name: Rugged Shirt
description: This traditional design evokes the intrepid times of the first Archipelago explorers.

name: Safari shirt
description: A relaxed but elegant sartorial classic, ideal for Temtem-hunting in the Kisiwan plains.

name: Shirt/t-shirt combo
description: A versatile combination: wear open when you're in the field, button down for a dressier look.

name: Shirt with shoulder pads
description: Do they make you look stronger? Or just bigger?

name: Sleeveless Top
description: A form-fitting design that comes with a matching bracelet.

name: Striped Bikini
description: Hit the Sillaro beaches in style with this flirty bikini.

name: Striped t-shirt
description: Nothing like simple stripes to show off your best tints!

name: Survivor's Garb
description: Lightweight yet protective, it features chest protection, sturdy textiles and heavy-duty leather gloves.

name: Tri-stripe t-shirt
description: Tri-stripe for a tre-mendous t-shirt!

name: Two-tone hoodie
description: A comfy hoodie, in a sporty bi-tone design.

name: Underwear
description: Provides support or protection against sweat, as required.

name: Adventure Pants
description: Featuring heavy tactical boots and steel-reinforced knee pads, these are for tamers who expect serious opposition.

name: Baggy Pants
description: Reinforced pants with spats to offer maximum protection for the outdoorsy tamer.

name: Chinos
description: These pants are a perfect compromise between sport and dress, ideal for most non-Dojo occasions.

name: Cipanku-style jodhpurs
description: Originally worn by the Temtem-riders of yore, these pants bring the design up to date with trad-chic!

name: Cotton Underwear
description: Timeless and comfy.

name: Dojo pants
description: Although not compulsory any more, many Dojo students still wear them with pride.

name: Dojo Raider Shorts
description: Ideal for intrepid adventurers who feel at home in the wilderness.

name: Flowery Sarong
description: Practical and cute wraparound skirt from the Myrisles.

name: Hiking Pants
description: With special knee reinforcements and sturdy trekking boots, these will see you through the longest of wilderness treks.

name: Jeans and heavy-duty boots
description: Picking mushrooms in the forest or catching Temtem by the river? No matter what you do, this rugged combination will serve you well.

name: Kilt and sporran
description: The traditional attire of the Lochburgian highlanders, with strong cultural ties to the Domnall-era clans.

name: Kisiwan Resistance pants
description: Optimal for negotiating the broken terrain of the savanna... and for showing your defiance against the invaders.

name: Knickerbockers
location: Mokupuni (A free pair can be found in Nanga)
description: Decorated with a subtle geometric pattern, these baggy trousers are popular among retro fans.

name: Knit-cuff pants
description: A must-have for any wardrobe. Ideal for daily casual wear.

name: Laid-back shorts
description: Nothing says "vacation" like shorts and flip-flops.

name: Nanga Miniskirt
description: A cute design with a subtle pattern inspired by Canopath leaves.

name: Pencil pants and heels
description: Office meets pub! This combination of snug-fitting, flattering pants and sensible shoes is ideal for work or a night out in Properton.

name: Relaxed Shorts
description: A typically laid-back style for the Denizan summers.

name: Shorts and capri leggings
description: Always look your best, out catching Temtem or showing them off in the Dojo.

name: Skinny Jeans
description: Contemporary and flattering, made in elastic, form-fitting denim.

name: Sporty tamer trousers
description: Elastic and form-fitting, for the tamer who likes to exercise at the same time as they practice their art!

name: Striped Baggy Pants
description: Sturdy outdoor pants with spats keep you elegantly protected while catching Temtem in the wild.

name: Swimwear
description: For tamers who spend a lot of time on the beach and don't mind flaunting it.

name: Tartan miniskirt and boots
description: Take me back to Swinging Properton! This retro design is a forward-looking nod to the best decades of Arburian fashion.

name: Tie Down Pants
description: Practical shorts, enhanced with tied rope details for a rustic touch.

name: Tracksuit Pants
description: Practical and sporty for tamers who need a lot of freedom of movement.

name: Belsoto grunt uniform
description: The lowest rank of Belsoto goons wear this uniform.

name: Camo fatigues
description: No matter if you're hunting Lumas or Belsotos, this camo outfit will serve you well in the Omninesian jungles.

name: Onsenshima set
description: The perfect way to preserve modesty while you enjoy a deliciously relaxing hot bath at the best onsen in the Archipelago.

name: Resistance dress uniform
description: The parade version of the Kisiwan Reistance uniform. Wear it with pride, veteran of Uhuru!

name: Sundress and Sneakers
description: A cute look for when you want to lounge around or hit the Dojo.

name: Tamers Keikogi
description: Only the most formal of Dojos mandate the use of the official practice clothes.

name: Wetsuit
description: Full neoprene wetsuit, especially suited for Water tamers who spend long days in the Sillaro.

name: Cactus bag
description: Caution: Might still contain spines.

name: Camo rucksack
description: Keep all your jungle survival essentials dry and tidy with this pro backpack.

name: Cute purse bag
description: Is it a backpack in the shape of a purse, or a giant coin purse disguised as a backpack? Only one way to find out!

name: Donut Bag
description: Not the most practical of rucksacks... but it's so yummy!

name: Hiking backpack
description: Preparing for a long trip across the Archipelago? Stash all your essentials in this sturdy backpack.

name: Incubator device
description: A hi-tech prototype by Akihiro Labs, beta-tested by you! The first egg in your squad will hatch 100% faster.

name: Leafy Bag
description: Made with authentic, especially cured leaves of the Giant Banyan by Mokupuni artisants.

name: Scholar's Best Friend
description: This practical, sartorial bag can be worn comfortably as a rucksack or carried elegantly like a briefcase. Ideal for both freshers and University dons!

name: School Bag
description: A trusty backpack for school or a day trip to the beach

name: Striped Backpack
description: Ideal for school, Dojo practice or simply to carry your TemCards and a sandwich.

name: Survival Kit
description: Water container, with water purifying tables and the rest of the must-haves for survival on the surface of Tucma.

name: Trendy knapsack
description: A small and smart knapsack, with two separate zipped compartments, to keep Temcards and potions tidy.
